comment: Professor is very passionate about world literature. Each class is a lecture, so can get boring at times, but very sweet. Class includes a midterm, final, 6 short quizzes and one 5 page paper. Make sure to read the assigned reading and you will do fine. Would take again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Knows his stuff and in really understanding towards specific situations. Read the material and you will make an A.

Was not the biggest fan of this class. There were three papers, but they were all on the same subject.. First two were 6 pages and the third one was going to be 12 pages, but he brought it down to 9. Plus, we read a pretty boring research book and had quizes on it almost everyday. Not a bad class, but not very good either.

Hendricks is a pretty easy professor. He doesn't lecture for long and you almost always get out of class early. He had 3 papers he assigned in my class. Two papers were 6 pages each and the final was 9 pages. He has conference days to help you with your essays. The quizzes could be difficult but they got easier as the class went on. Easy grader.

He is a very easy English teacher. He only gives 5 papers the whole semester and that's about it, besides the quizzes he gives just about every class . But they're real simple.  If you go to him and ask him to look over your paper he'll like you and work with you that much more. Could not have asked for a better Eng 1101 professor.

A quiz every meet! He's a laid back, chill professor. With his papers and test, you'll be confused and won't be sure as to what to expect. He has open discussions and doesn't force anyone to talk. Great night class. He's a great professor, just a little confusing time to time. Can miss up to 3 classes. Extra credit for commenting. TEXTBOOK REQUIRED

Lots of dumb, little quizzes. If you don't have great information retention, you will fail many of the quizzes. Lots of writing (long essays), but he was more lenient in his grading after half the class dropped him. My experience with him went from awful to okay over the course of the semester,

He is seriously a horrible teacher. He never responds to emails, never goes over things of use for the next paper, we have to write like 4 papers all 5+ pages long, he is super boring, a harsh grader, the final is a 10 page paper. I DO NOT RECOMMEND

You have to write 4 papers in his class. Most of them have to be 6 pages long and the final is 10 pages long. I would not suggest taking his class. His class is boring but mandatory. Nothing gone over in class helps, so it's pretty pointless to come to class. But you have to. You have 5 question quizzes a lot over like 30 pages of reading.
He is very boring and what you do in class hardly or most times not at all pertains to the paper that you have to write. He also is a harsh grader
Do not take him!!!! He is boring and grades harshly.
